Package logic

Class Farmer

java.lang.Object
logic.Farmer
public class Farmer extends Object

Farmer

This class emulates the player, its attributes, and responsibilities. It interacts with classes such as MyFarm, Crop, PlotLand. It describes the player such as their stats and actions.

Since:
2022-11-07

      public Farmer()
      This constructors makes a new Farmer/player object. It starts off with the default values for a new player.
      Parameters:
      name - what the player should be called

    • plantCrop

      public boolean plantCrop(PlotLand plot, logic.Crop seedling, int currentDay)
      This method is what the player does when planting a NEW crop on a tile.
      Parameters:
      plot - the tile in question to be interacted with
      seedling - the Crop object to be put inside plot
      currentDay - what the current game day is for growing reference

    • harvestCrop

      public void harvestCrop(PlotLand plot, ArrayList<String> msg)
      This method is what the player does when harvesting a crop inside a tile. This includes the calculations in income from harvesting a crop.
      Parameters:
      plot - the tile in question to be interacted with

    • calculateFinalHarvestPrice

      public double calculateFinalHarvestPrice(PlotLand plot, int yield, double basePrice, int farmerTypeBonus)
      This method is a subroutine to calculate the final income of a player when harvesting a single crop.
      Parameters:
      plot - the tile in question to be interacted with
      yield - the pieces of plant received in harvesting
      basePrice - the price per piece of plant
      farmerTypeBonus - extra cash from being a registered farmer
      Returns:
      double the final calculated income for one crop harvest

    • updateLvl

      public void updateLvl()
      This method updates the current lvl of a player with respect to XP.

    • getSeedCostReduction

      public int getSeedCostReduction(int farmerType)
      This method returns the amount of coinage reduced from being a certain farmer type.
      Parameters:
      farmerType - the code of farmer you are
      Returns:
      int the amount deducted from a seed cost

    • getWaterBonusLimitIncrease

      public int getWaterBonusLimitIncrease(int farmerType)
      This method returns the bonus water limit increase depending on the farmer type you are
      Parameters:
      farmerType - the code of farmer you are
      Returns:
      int the amount increased from the water limit of a crop

      This method returns the bonus fertilizer limit increase depending on the farmer type you are
      Parameters:
      farmerType - the code of farmer you are
      Returns:
      int the amount increased from the fertilizer limit of a crop
